properties.markdownProperty:
Document interactions class (`documentInteractions`) provides two methods to enhance the interaction between the view and document trees.
- `open_properties_dialog` opens the property dialog for the given identifier (ProteusID). Raises an error if the object does not exists. This method can be used in the HTML views to open dialogs using buttons or click events (example in the proteus default template)
- `select_and_navigate_to_object` takes an object identifier (ProteusID) as argument, selects the object in the tree and navigate to it in the current view. If the object is in a different document, asks the user for confirmation in order to change the selected document tab.
